msbt.message: HmmOh, . Sorry, I was just kinda spacing out there. You know, deep thoughts. Actually, to tell you the truth, I was thinking about moving away from .

Oh, , I'm glad you're here.I know it's not my usual style to be serious, but I'm trying to make an important decision. Should I move away from ?I feel like the bright lights of another island are calling me
Question for you, . What lies beyond the shimmering sea? It never used to bother me, but now I feel like I need to find out.You never know where you'll find your next great business idea!
, I didn't know you felt that way!If that's the case, then I couldn't possibly leave. I couldn't abandon my like that! Whew. That was close. Let's hug it out, and then get back to making the coolest.
Well, when you put it like that, how could I possibly leave?Move canceled! I'm 100 percent back on Team !
Whoa! I didn't know you felt that way! How could I leave one of my biggest fans high and dry? That's it, then. Decision made! The Mystery Tour is postponed indefinitely!
Well, alright then! That settles it!You'll always have top billing in my heart, .But now it's time for me to take the Show on the road!

Ahhh, I never thought this day would come, but I guess nothing can last forever, right? I will miss you, and I'm not just saying that. You've always had top billing in my heart. Enjoy your life on while I sail away into the unknown hopefully on a luxury yacht. Ha HA!

Well, there it is. I guess I'm leaving! Thanks for everything, . This isn't something to be sad about, like when your favorite TV show gets canceled. It's something to be cautiously excited about, like when your favorite TV show changes time slots!
